Unnamed: 4: Bernard Clayton's Complete Book of Bread

Unnamed: 0: As it appears above, recipe yields how many loaves?
In mixing bowl combine half of the flour, all the sugar, salt, yeast and dry milk.  Add water and beat with the paddle attachment
to blend thoroughly.  Add shortening and continue beating until smooth. Add remaining flour gradually, until a smooth, supple
dough forms.  Knead for 8-10 minutes on low speed.  Cover with plastic wrap and let rise until doubled.  Turn out onto work
table and divide into 28-oz. portions.  Shape and place in loaf pans.  Place pans in bakery cabinet and let rise again.  Bake at
325° for 25 minutes, rotate pans, then bake another 7-10 minutes with the vent pulled out.
